main: ^We are gathered here today to celebrate the coming of age of our dear Noelle.
^Next in line to the Tempest family name,
^the finest of any family here on this little island.
^A beacon of hope against any and all creatures that lurk in the shadow.
^Now Noelle, are you ready to make all of us proud?
^Well what are you waiting for then? Drink up! Awaken your inner potential!
^You made it, my dear. Are you seriously trying to destroy
^No no, of course not! I followed the recipe exactly!
^It shouldn’t be affecting our daughter like this!
^Well this is great, just great. Our only heir, a monster!
^You didn’t tell me there was a monster on your side of the family.
^No that’s presposterous. That can’t be possible.
^Now listen here, this is what happened.
^Our darling Noelle was moments away from completing her coming of age ritual
^when a vicious creature attacked her out of nowhere.
^The creature was ultimately slain by yours truly,
^but at the tragic cost of our dear daughter.
^How terrible this day is, for the Tempest family to be robbed of its only heir,
^You can’t do this! I’m your daughter!
^Not anymore, not after what you have become.
^But what about the family? I’m your only daughter, you have no other heirs.
^I’m sure we can make one up.
^How's this? A long lost child who miraculously has Tempest blood.
^Oh it will be a bit of a stretch,
^but not as much as a creature becoming the next head of the Tempest family.
^Oh to think, all the time and resources we wasted,
^You really had to go and ruin this for everyone, didn’t you?
^Goodbye Noelle, and may the gods have mercy on your soul.
Chase: ^Run and run and run, and never come back!
